title: Share of population that uses a smartphone in North America 2011 to 2018
summary: In general Share of population has rose over the Year.
Share of population is slightly increasing from 2012 to 2015, and finally roughly constant from 2015 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Share of population, of value 66.5 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum Share of population about 37.9 was reached at Year 2012
